Deck.Description: Maintains a deck of items. Supports various operations for drawing items from and inserting items into the deck.

_items.Description: A list containing the ordered contents of the Deck

_next_index.Description: The index of the next card to be drawn/peeked

__init__().Description: Initializes and shuffles a Deck given a list of Items to put in it

draw().Description: Returns the next Item on the top of the Deck and places it on the bottom

peek().Description: Returns the next Item on the top of the Deck and replaces it back on the top

draw_and_remove().Description: Returns the next Item on the top of the Deck and removes it from the Deck

insert_on_bottom().Description: Inserts the given Item on the bottom of the Deck

insert_on_top().Description: Inserts the given Item on the top of the Deck

insert_randomly().Description: Inserts the given Item somewhere in the Deck randomly
